title: Diddy gets into the Halloween spirit in flashy jumpsuit as he heads to the pumpkin patch
text:
With Halloween coming up, it's the time of year when families visit farm patches to pick the perfect pumpkin.

And that's what proud dad Diddy did on Friday.

The 49-year-old rapper, record producer and entrepreneur took three of his six kids to Underwood Family Farms, near Somis, in the countryside north of Los Angeles.

Farmer Diddy: The rapper-entrepreneur sat on a tractor as his kids Christian, 21, and twins D'Lila Star and Jessie James, 13, posed at a farm ahead of Halloween

They all had fun going for a tractor ride and feasting on freshly harvested sweetcorn.

Diddy, whose full name is Sean Combs, even got into an enclosure to pet adorable baby goats.

And, of course, they got down to the serious business of picking a pumpkin.

The star, who was unmissable in a bright red tracksuit, was seen carrying a particularly large and heavy one off the patch.

Getting down to business: Diddy, aka Sean Combs carried a huge pumpkin off the patch

Hmmm, which way?: The 49-year-old seems to be musing about something as sat behinds the wheel of the small tractor

He was joined by Christian, 21, and twins D'Lila Star and Jessie James, 13, whom he shared with his late long-time love Kimberly Porter.

The two girls matched up in white T-shirts plus red and black plaid shirts that they tied in a knot at the waist, teamed with jeans.

Christian donned a black T-shirt with a brightly colored image from Mary J. Blige's hit, I Can Love You, plus distressed jeans.

So cute: The celebrity even got into a small enclosure to pet some baby goats

Diddy also shares Justin, 26, with first wife, designer Misa Hylton-Brim, and daughter Chance, 13, with ex-girlfriend Sara Chapman.

He also adopted Kimberly's son Quincy, 28.

Diddy said he 'jumped into mommy mode' when she died suddenly of pneumonia at age 47 last Novmber.

He told Essence magazine he's no longer a 'part-time father, adding, 'my kids come before anything else in my life.'
description: The  rapper, 49, appeared to having as much fun as Christian, 21, and twins Jessie James and D'Lila Star and  13, when they were seen at Underwood Family Farms,north of LA, on Friday.
